description:
Private bedroom is available in a clean, spacious three bedroom single family home.

The bedroom is furnished with a twin bed, night stand, three-way lamp, chest of drawers, chair, ceiling fan/light, full length mirror, large closet and window treatment (room darkening thermal curtains over blinds). The bedroom is located on the second floor and is large enough for additional furnishing the tenant is welcome to bring. The common (shared) areas of the house include the kitchen (appliances include stove/oven, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, blender/juicer and toaster)  cabinet space, cookware and disposable dishes and utensils. The full bathroom is on the second floor adjacent to the full bathroom. The half bath, study, living room, dining room and sun porch are the common areas located on the first floor. The washer and dryer are  in the basement . Utilities - heat (gas), electric, water and WIFI are provided, the house has a monitored security system and required smoke/carbon monoxide detectors/fire extinguisher are in place.

The hosts bedroom and office are in the basement of the house,  we're available if needed. We also act as concierges since we know the Chicago area well.

The house is in the Grand Crossing community on the South Side of the city. It's a working class residential neighborhood with the amenities needed for travelers seeking to explore all Chicago has to offer.

The house is centrally located  5 minutes by car/Uber from UChicago campus/hospital in Hyde Park and 20 minutes from Downtown Chicago. There is street parking in front and quick access to I-94 Dan Ryan Expressway. The CTA 69th Red Line and King Dr Green Line stations are close by and the house is steps away from the No. 67(east/west), 3(north/south), 30(southeast) and N5(late night) CTA bus routes.

description:
Sleep on the downtown-leaning edge of Chicago's ultra-hip Wicker Park neighborhood! Step out your front door to the Blue Line L train - 2 minute walk to the station! Front door to downtown in 10 minutes! This studio apartment, located in a brand-new building, offers two king beds, beautiful full bathroom, kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances,  in-unit washer/dryer, walk-in closet and more - perfect for your city home base!

Want advice? Looking for that local knowledge? We've got a guidebook telling you all the secrets! We're from Chicago. We live here. We know the place, and we have an opinion!

This studio apartment offers...
- TWO KING BEDS sleeping FOUR guests plus walk-in closet
-1 TWIN rollaway bed in the walk in closet
- FULL KITCHEN with stainless steel appliances including DISHWASHER, pots and pans, tableware, glassware and silverware provided, plus a wealth of coffee options and equipment, including French press and drip machine, ground AND whole bean coffee, sweeteners and half/half
- FULL BATHROOM with stand up glass door and stonewalled shower
- IN-UNIT WASHER DRYER
- High speed WiFi and TV with local channels and either Roku or FireTV
- Walk-in closet

-----------
PARKING
There's a parking lot around the corner which you can book in advance on an app.  It doesn't get much easier than that in Chicago.  Street parking is hard to find and not recommended.
----------
CHECK-IN TIME 
Typically, guests may receive the keys and drop their bags in the apartment as early as 12PM (noon). The cleaners do need until 4PM to do their work, and the apartment may be dirty anytime until 4.  
If you'd like to drop your bags early and head out until the cleaners finish, we can usually accommodate you! If you'd like to take a nap or shower right away, and the night before your stay isn't booked yet, let's discuss booking that night before! Then you could arrive as early as you'd like that day! 
----------
CHECK-OUT TIME
11AM is check-out. If you'll need a check-out after 11AM, and the night after your stay isn't booked yet, let's chat about booking that next night! Then you could leave as late as you'd like that day!
----------
LUGGAGE STORAGE
Need luggage storage the morning of check-in or the afternoon of check-out?
We have a locker in a storage unit a ten-minute walk away! (It's .2 miles, just across a couple of stoplights!) Details provided the day before arrival.
----------
OCCUPANCY 
Upon booking, your reservation will have paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number whether visiting or sleeping,  you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first. 
We consider the maximum capacity of the apartment to be its sleeping capacity - FOUR individuals. Anyone past four would not be permitted. 
Enjoy the city! Please don’t bring a party back.
----------
RATES
Rates and minimum stays change constantly - every night is different! 
The nightly rate changes based on number of guests, which is verified upon arrival. Please do your best to let me know how many guests will be staying in advance!

The entire apartment is yours during your stay! You will not share with anyone else outside of your group!

IF YOU WILL NOT HAVE A US PHONE NUMBER, we ask that you download the Whats App phone texting app. We also have We Chat - please provide your ID!

WICKER PARK! 
The apartment is located right on Milwaukee Avenue, the center of Chicago's hipster haven! This awesome neighborhood has so many bars, restaurants, independent coffee joints and quirky shops you'll have no idea where to start - until you check out our curated guidebook! We'll give you a taste for starters.

CHEESIES, a casual bar up the street, has killer grilled cheese. The Popper is the best choice on the menu. We've only been after a few drinks, but we see people there all day. Good sign. 
EMPORIUM ARCADE BAR WICKER PARK is great for games and drinks. The cocktails are a little pricey, but you can play pinball for hours.  
PIECE PIZZA AND BREWERY has the best New Haven style pizza outside of Connecticut, and even better, it's not from New York! Their Hefeweizen is top notch, and they have live music all the time.
And at PODHALANKA you'll experience a Polish grandmother's welcome by stuffing you with blintzes, pierogies, and roast beef - and not taking 'please, no more' for an answer. 

We’ve got tips about hidden speakeasy’s and burlesque shows, coffee shops and grab-and-go breakfast, high-end can't miss dinners, quick meals, late nights and boozy brunch, plus extensive day trips all throughout the city. We put our heart into it, and you’ll find advice on other can’t-miss places worth a train or Uber ride, including FIVE distinct nightlife districts throughout the city!

neighborhood_overview:
WICKER PARK! 
The apartment is located right on Milwaukee Avenue, the center of Chicago's hipster haven! This awesome neighborhood has so many bars, restaurants, independent coffee joints and quirky shops you'll have no idea where to start - until you check out our curated guidebook! We'll give you a taste for starters.

CHEESIES, a casual bar up the street, has killer grilled cheese. The Popper is the best choice on the menu. We've only been after a few drinks, but we see people there all day. Good sign. 
EMPORIUM ARCADE BAR WICKER PARK is great for games and drinks. The cocktails are a little pricey, but you can play pinball for hours.  
PIECE PIZZA AND BREWERY has the best New Haven style pizza outside of Connecticut, and even better, it's not from New York! Their Hefeweizen is top notch, and they have live music all the time.
And at PODHALANKA you'll experience a Polish grandmother's welcome by stuffing you with blintzes, pierogies, and roast beef - and not taking 'please, no more' for an answer. 

We’ve got tips about hidden speakeasy’s and burlesque shows, coffee shops and grab-and-go breakfast, high-end can't miss dinners, quick meals, late nights and boozy brunch, plus extensive day trips all throughout the city. We put our heart into it, and you’ll find advice on other can’t-miss places worth a train or Uber ride, including FIVE distinct nightlife districts throughout the city!

space:
Want advice? Looking for that local knowledge? We've got a guidebook telling you all the secrets! We're from Chicago. We live here. We know the place, and we have an opinion!

This studio apartment offers...
- TWO KING BEDS sleeping FOUR guests plus walk-in closet
-1 TWIN rollaway bed in the walk in closet
- FULL KITCHEN with stainless steel appliances including DISHWASHER, pots and pans, tableware, glassware and silverware provided, plus a wealth of coffee options and equipment, including French press and drip machine, ground AND whole bean coffee, sweeteners and half/half
- FULL BATHROOM with stand up glass door and stonewalled shower
- IN-UNIT WASHER DRYER
- High speed WiFi and TV with local channels and either Roku or FireTV
- Walk-in closet

-----------
PARKING
There's a parking lot around the corner which you can book in advance on an app.  It doesn't get much easier than that in Chicago.  Street parking is hard to find and not recommended.
----------
CHECK-IN TIME 
Typically, guests may receive the keys and drop their bags in the apartment as early as 12PM (noon). The cleaners do need until 4PM to do their work, and the apartment may be dirty anytime until 4.  
If you'd like to drop your bags early and head out until the cleaners finish, we can usually accommodate you! If you'd like to take a nap or shower right away, and the night before your stay isn't booked yet, let's discuss booking that night before! Then you could arrive as early as you'd like that day! 
----------
CHECK-OUT TIME
11AM is check-out. If you'll need a check-out after 11AM, and the night after your stay isn't booked yet, let's chat about booking that next night! Then you could leave as late as you'd like that day!
----------
LUGGAGE STORAGE
Need luggage storage the morning of check-in or the afternoon of check-out?
We have a locker in a storage unit a ten-minute walk away! (It's .2 miles, just across a couple of stoplights!) Details provided the day before arrival.
----------
OCCUPANCY 
Upon booking, your reservation will have paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number whether visiting or sleeping,  you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first. 
We consider the maximum capacity of the apartment to be its sleeping capacity - FOUR individuals. Anyone past four would not be permitted. 
Enjoy the city! Please don’t bring a party back.
----------
RATES
Rates and minimum stays change constantly - every night is different! 
The nightly rate changes based on number of guests, which is verified upon arrival. Please do your best to let me know how many guests will be staying in advance!
